questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) The human skeleton

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) The human skeleton

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A skeleton figure
C) A family gathering
D) A piece of modern art

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A skeleton figure
C) A person
D) A sculpture

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A beach
C) A dark area with some lights
D) A busy street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A skeleton figure
C) A dog
D) A car

What is the skeleton figure doing?
A) Sitting on a bench
B) Standing next to a table
C) Riding a bicycle
D) Lying on the ground

What is the skeleton figure holding?
A) A book
B) A cup
C) Nothing
D) A sign

What kind of surface is the skeleton standing on?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Dirt or gravel
D) Concrete

What is the skeleton figure positioned next to?
A) A tree
B) A table
C) A car
D) A bench

What is the primary color of the skeleton?
A) Bright white
B) Dark brown
C) Metallic silver
D) Pale yellowish-brown

What is the skeleton figure's posture?
A) Sitting
B) Standing upright
C) Lying down
D) Running

What is the skeleton figure's head position?
A) Tilted to the side
B) Facing forward
C) Looking down
D) Looking up

What is the skeleton leaning against?
A) A wall
B) A pole or frame
C) Another skeleton
D) A bicycle

What is the skeleton's arm position?
A) Both arms raised
B) One arm raised, one arm down
C) Both arms down
D) One arm behind its back

What is the skeleton's hand position?
A) Holding an object
B) Empty and open
C) Clenched into fists
D) Waving

What is the skeleton's overall condition?
A) Pristine and new
B) Old and weathered
C) Broken and damaged
D) Covered in dirt

What is the skeleton's leg position?
A) Crossed
B) Standing straight
C) Bent at the knees
D) Sitting

What is the skeleton's spine like?
A) Curved
B) Straight
C) Twisted
D) Missing

What kind of material is the structure in the background made of?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Fabric

What is the skeleton's jaw position?
A) Open
B) Closed
C) Missing
D) Clenched

What is the skeleton's eye position?
A) Wide open
B) Closed
C) Hollow and empty
D) Covered

What kind of environment is the photo taken in?
A) Indoor
B) Outdoor
C) Underwater
D) Underground

What is the skeleton's overall appearance?
A) Clean and new
B) Old and weathered
C) Broken and damaged
D) Covered in dirt

What can be seen to the left of the skeleton?
A) A tree
B) A car
C) A table
D) A person
